input_text:
Job Title: Front End Developer

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job#: 2025449

Job Description:

I have a front end/UI developer that has to be strong in angular, RXJS and asyncronous. the position sits near pittsburgh, PA and onsite 2-3 days a week. If interested, please email [email protected]

Angular, RXJS(Heavy needed)

Looking for asynchronous, some are fast and some are slow. THe UI needs to provide

Angular 13 or 17

2-3 days in the office

Nobody can take their time to catch up

Client is the ops and business

So they need gather requirments, develop, unit testing, and deploy

Maintenance and New Features development

Evaluating the resource based on problem solving in production

EEO Employer

Apex Systems is an equal opportunity employer. If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation in using our website for a search or application, please contact our Employee Services Department at [email protected] or 844-463-6178 .
